summary: Replaces the Vanilla Red Glow of Daedric Armor & Weapons with a Yellow Glow. Works on Standard & Enchanted
descriptionHtml:
FOR OTHER COLORS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26156/

Replaces the Vanilla Red Glow of Daedric Armor & Weapons with a Yellow Glow. Works on Standard & Enchanted. 
ATTENTION: The Inventory View of the Daedric Greatsword appears small, but does not affect actual weapon.

Also see SkyRum: Better Booze: _ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23333

Also see Better Jorrvaskr: _ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22876

Also see Asgard\'s Kingdom: _ Dwemer Kingdom: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25858
author: dmcthunder999
